npm install --save-dev @nomiclabs/hardhat-ethers ethers
await election.currentStage();
const election = await ethers.getContractAt("CommitRevealElection", "<contract-address>");
npx hardhat run scripts/test-contract.js --network localhost
await run("scripts/deploy.js")
await run("compile")
await voting.getResults()
await voting.vote(1)
const voting = await Voting.attach("0xYourContractAddressHere")
const Voting = await ethers.getContractFactory("Voting")
await ethers.getSigners()
